thread.title: Prime Property: 98 cities in the 'smart' race!
thread.title_full: Prime Property: 98 cities in the 'smart' race!

title: Prime Property: 98 cities in the 'smart' race!
text:
Source: CNBC-TV18 Prime Property: 98 cities in the 'smart' race! The centre on Thursday released the much awaited list of 98 smart city nominees. Uttar Pradesh managed to bag the maximum of 13 nominations, Tamil Nadu finished second at 12 and Maharashtra got the third position with 10 cities being selected. But this is just a beginning of what may turn out to be a top intercity competition. Like this story, share it with millions of investors on M3 Prime Property: 98 cities in the smart race! The centre on Thursday released the much awaited list of 98 smart city nominees. Uttar Pradesh managed to bag the maximum of 13 nominations, Tamil Nadu finished second at 12 and Maharashtra got the third position with 10 cities being selected. But this is just a beginning of what may turn out to be a top intercity competition. Post your opinion here Prime Property 
T his week's Prime Property is doing a special on Smart Cities. The centre on Thursday released the much awaited list of 98 smart city nominees. Uttar Pradesh managed to bag the maximum of 13 nominations, Tamil Nadu finished second at 12 and Maharashtra got the third position with 10 cities being selected. But this is just a beginning of what may turn out to be a top intercity competition. 
Watch accompanying videos for more...
